basics.name: Hayden Bireley
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

courses: Algorithms, Software Engineering, Computer Programming 1 (Java), Data Structures using Advanced Java, C Programming, Program Structure

work.summary: Full-time greenskeeper at The Villages Golf and Country Club. Maintained all aspects of the golf course:  mowing, course setup, edging, raking, blowing and general debris pickup. Required thorough, quality work, worked in teams or individually. Operated mowers, Gators, Workman Utility Vehicles and interacted with guests on the course.
Maintained walking trails in the Amberwood neighborhood. Work included hedge and tree trimming, debris clearing, and invasive plant removal. Required work to be done by strict deadlines.

Activides and HONORS: Member of Grey Hats at UH Manoa
Member of The Live Oak Emerald Regime Marching Band | Fall 2016-2019
Member of Live Oak Jazz Band | Spring 2018
Member Live Oak Golf team | Spring of 2019 and 2020
